name: Hit Vanguard
description:
Can only be equipped by Cavalry units. While mounted, if unit initiated combat this phase, until the end of the phase, allies within two spaces have @{const:gbp:[Hit +20]} in combat.

Cannot be equipped alongside another “Vanguard” ability. A unit can only benefit from the effects of one “Vanguard” ability at once, and may choose which to benefit from before combat if there are multiple possibilities.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
